Welcome to the personal website of Cornelis Kolbach. This is where he likes to blog about his professional field, to show his work and where he may be contacted.

Most recent posts

Showcase: DdUX Website

Cornelis was responsible for the visual design, CSS and markup programming and the design of the interaction models of www.ddux.org. DdUX means Design for Digital User eXperience. It is a web site around a community of researchers, students, teachers and all people who work in the field of User Experience in the Dutch language area.

Showcase: DdUX Flyer

The DdUX barrel fold printed brochure was used as a handout at the CHI Nederland Conference 2007 in The Kingdom of the Netherlands.

Showcase: KLM Wireless internet

The KLM Wireless internet portal at Schiphol, Amsterdam International Airport.

Showcase: Home hero

HomeHero™ is a collection of home fire safety products designed to give people more control over their safety and security needs. Cornelis worked as interaction, front-end engineer and technical director on the creation of the HomeHero campaign website.

Showcase: Clipblast website

ClipBlast! is a Video Index, Search and Navigation Platform. ClipBlast! technology helps Viewers search, navigate, watch and personalise their experience with the Video Web.
